Class ConfigDeployer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.chameleon.core.services.AbstractDeployer
      • org.ow2.chameleon.core.services.ExtensionBasedDeployer
        • org.ow2.chameleon.core.activators.ConfigDeployer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener, Deployer

    public class ConfigDeployer
extends ExtensionBasedDeployer
implements org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener
    Deployer pushing the content of 'cfg' files to the Configuration Admin.
    Version:
    $Id: 1.0.4 $Id
    Author:
    The OW2 Chameleon Team

      • parsePid

        String[] parsePid(String path)
        Parses cfg file associated PID. This supports both ManagedService PID and ManagedServiceFactory PID
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        Returns:
        structure {pid, factory pid} or {pid, null if not a Factory configuration.

                                            throws IOException
        Gets a Configuration object.
        Parameters:
        pid - the pid
        factoryPid - the factory pid
        cm - the config admin service
        Returns:
